title: Did sexual predators use "fortint " for the groom's children?
subtitle: The New Jersey Attorney General gave a general warning about 19 popular apps, including Fortnet, but news reports singled out the game although she was not involved in a repressive campaign in September 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Law enforcement officials said that parents should be concerned about sexually predators who use game applications such as Fortnet to raise children.
